sense.name: Something that serves to suggest a certain fact.
sense.examples: There were indications of strain. He could not believe the indications from the meter. There were indications that it was time to leave.

sense.name: The act of indicating or pointing out by name.
sense.examples: She made indications as if to leave. He made several indications of his intentions.

sense.name: (medicine) a reason to prescribe a drug or perform a procedure.
sense.examples: The infection was an indication for antibiotics. The blockage was an indication for surgery.
